name: Orient Fantastic Dream
description:
Orient Fantastic Dream is a bullet hell game just like touhou project stg (Shooting Game).

Based on the Oriental mysterious stories.
Colorful bullet barrage and splendid background music.
This game move the classic touhou project to mobile platform.
It will give you a different new story and different experience.

From sky castle to evernight city, New unsual events appear again.
Spirit and Demons destory the balance of dream land.
Miko Reimu go with her friend Marisa,Youmu,Yuyuko to search the answer for these anomalies.



Credit Thanks to
Taisei Project https://github.com/taisei-project/taisei/blob/master/COPYING
